tasks.label: Build Native: Debug
tasks.command: mkdir -p build_debug && cd build_debug && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug .. && make -j 12

tasks.label: Build Native: Release
tasks.command: mkdir -p build_release && cd build_release && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DUKV_BUILD_BENCHMARKS=0 -DUKV_BUILD_TESTS=0 .. && make -j 12

tasks.label: Build Native: Debug UMem Test
tasks.command: mkdir -p build_debug && cd build_debug && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DUKV_BUILD_TESTS=1 -DUKV_BUILD_BENCHMARKS=0 .. && make test_units_ukv_embedded_umem -j8

tasks.label: Build Native: Debug LevelDB Test
tasks.command: mkdir -p build_debug && cd build_debug && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DUKV_BUILD_TESTS=1 -DUKV_BUILD_BENCHMARKS=0 -DUKV_BUILD_ENGINE_LEVELDB=1 .. && make test_units_ukv_embedded_leveldb -j8

tasks.label: Build Native: Debug RocksDB Test
tasks.command: mkdir -p build_debug && cd build_debug && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DUKV_BUILD_TESTS=1 -DUKV_BUILD_BENCHMARKS=0 -DUKV_BUILD_ENGINE_ROCKSDB=1 .. && make test_units_ukv_embedded_rocksdb -j8

tasks.label: Build Native: Debug UDisk Test
tasks.command: mkdir -p build_debug && cd build_debug && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug .. && make ukv_udisk_unit_test -j8

tasks.label: Build Native: Debug UMem Stress Test
tasks.command: mkdir -p build_debug && cd build_debug && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DUKV_BUILD_TESTS=1 -DUKV_BUILD_BENCHMARKS=0 .. && make stress_insert_atomic_isolated_ukv_embedded_umem -j8

tasks.label: Build Native: Debug RocksDB Stress Test
tasks.command: mkdir -p build_debug && cd build_debug && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DUKV_BUILD_TESTS=1 -DUKV_BUILD_BENCHMARKS=0 -DUKV_BUILD_ENGINE_ROCKSDB=1 .. && make stress_insert_atomic_isolated_ukv_rocembedded_ksdb -j8

tasks.label: Build Native: Debug UMem Test API
tasks.command: mkdir -p build_debug && cd build_debug && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DUKV_BUILD_TESTS=1 -DUKV_BUILD_BENCHMARKS=0 .. && make ukv_umem_api_test -j8

tasks.label: Build Native: Debug LevelDB Test API
tasks.command: mkdir -p build_debug && cd build_debug && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DUKV_BUILD_TESTS=1 -DUKV_BUILD_BENCHMARKS=0 -DDUKV_BUILD_ENGINE_LEVELDB=1 .. && make ukv_leveldb_api_test -j8

tasks.label: Build Native: Debug RocksDB Test API
tasks.command: mkdir -p build_debug && cd build_debug && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DUKV_BUILD_TESTS=1 -DUKV_BUILD_BENCHMARKS=0 -DDUKV_BUILD_ENGINE_ROCKSDB=1 .. && make ukv_rocksdb_api_test -j8

tasks.label: Build Native: Debug UMem Benchmark
tasks.command: mkdir -p build_debug && cd build_debug && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DUKV_BUILD_TESTS=0 -DUKV_BUILD_BENCHMARKS=1 .. && make benchmark_twitter_ukv_umem -j8

tasks.label: Build Native: Debug RocksDB Benchmark
tasks.command: mkdir -p build_debug && cd build_debug && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DUKV_BUILD_TESTS=0 -DUKV_BUILD_BENCHMARKS=1 -DUKV_BUILD_ENGINE_ROCKSDB=1 .. && make benchmark_twitter_ukv_rocksdb -j8

tasks.label: Build Native: Debug Arrow Benchmark
tasks.command: mkdir -p build_debug && cd build_debug && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DUKV_BUILD_TESTS=0 -DUKV_BUILD_BENCHMARKS=1 -DUKV_BUILD_API_FLIGHT_CLIENT=1 .. && make ukv_flight_client_twitter_benchmark -j8

tasks.label: Build Native: Debug UDisk Benchmark
tasks.command: mkdir -p build_debug && cd build_debug && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DUKV_BUILD_TESTS=0 -DUKV_BUILD_BENCHMARKS=1 .. && make ukv_udisk_twitter_benchmark -j8

tasks.label: Build Native: Debug Arrow Client
tasks.command: mkdir -p build_debug && cd build_debug && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DUKV_BUILD_API_FLIGHT_CLIENT=1 .. && make ukv_flight_client_test_units -j8 && sleep 5

tasks.label: Build Native: Debug Arrow Server
tasks.command: mkdir -p build_debug && cd build_debug && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DUKV_BUILD_API_FLIGHT_SERVER=1 .. && make ukv_flight_server_umem -j8
